attributes.action: Enable those that were we mis-sold Brexit to have the chance to vote again
attributes.background: Vote Leave stated "Let's give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week". Within 24 hours of the referendum result Nigel Farage has stated this was a mistake. Increased xenophobia and racism is now being reported all over the UK. If you regret Voting Leave, please sign up here

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
